art.author: sonia
art.post: I BELIEVE IT. THESE CHILDREN ARE SPEAKING THE TRUTH. JESUS IS HELPING ME A LOT WITH MY DESEASE AND I’M HAPPY NOW THAT I CAN SEE HIS FACE. OPEN YOUR HEART TO HIM BECAUSE YOUR LIVES WILL CHANGE FOR THE BETTER..
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
